title: Opening Performance - balade inouïe
desc:
An exploration into the unknown – mingling ambiguous perspectives –

dreamworlds of sensual, liberating experiences.

A fusion of reciprocal relationships:

Attraction, power, defense, dominance and submission, escape and refuge.

A phantasm of vivid imagination –

plants, flowers opening and closing…

streams of inspiration flowing from mountains into valleys…

movements, motions, gestures: wing beats, dripping drops…

spinning, shaking, shackling...

A voluptuous illustration of lust, seduction and pleasure…

AAAAHHH! The human body as a space for experience, uproar and fulfillment.
